```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nflreadr)
library(ggalt)
```

```{r}
plays <- load_pbp(2022)
```

```{r}
head(plays)
```

```{r}
type_plays <- c("pass", "run")

plays |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(posteam == "MIA") |>
  filter(week < 4) |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20) |>
  summarise(
    Totalplays = n()
  )
```

```{r}
plays |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(posteam == "MIA") |>
  filter(week < 4) |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20) |>
  summarise(
    TotalEPA = sum(epa)
  )
```
```{r}
plays |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(posteam == "MIA") |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20) |>
  summarise(
    TotalEPA = sum(epa)
  )
```
In the first three weeks of the 2022 season, Miami had 9 EPA but dropped down by almost 3 points by the end of the season. 

```{r}
9.000518	- 6.102557	
```

```{r}
nfl_plays_week3 <- plays |>
  group_by(posteam) |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(week < 4) |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20)
```

```{r}
nfl_plays_week3 <- nfl_plays_week3|>
  group_by(posteam) |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(week < 4) |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20) |>
  summarise(
    TotalEPA = sum(epa),
    Totalplays = n())
```

```{r}
nfl_plays_week8 <- plays |>
  group_by(posteam) |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(week > 4) |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20)
```


```{r}
nfl_plays_week8 <- nfl_plays_week8 |>
  group_by(posteam) |>
  filter(play_type %in% type_plays) |>
  filter(week > 4) |>
  filter (yardline_100 < 20) |>
  summarise(
    Totalplays = n(),
    TotalEPA = sum(epa))
```


```{r}
total_nfl <- nfl_plays_week3 |> left_join(nfl_plays_week8, join_by(posteam)) 
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_dumbbell(
    data=total_nfl, 
    aes(y=posteam, x=Totalplays.y, xend=TotalEPA.y)
  )
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_dumbbell(
    data=nfl_plays_week3, 
    aes(y=posteam, x=Totalplays, xend=TotalEPA),
    size = 1,
    colour = "grey",
    colour_x = "green",
    colour_xend = "blue")
```
